Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory213.png'}
{1: '1', 2: "Bethe's Voice", 3: '...Tsk! Noan! Hurry over and help!!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Bethe's Voice", 3: 'Your "replica" has stirred up some real trouble busting in here!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory711.jpg'}
{3: 'After cutting off the communication, the young man gazes at the human commandant seated by the bed, falling silent for a moment.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory712.jpg'}
{3: 'It has been about five or six hours since you willingly participated in this "peaceful abduction."'}
{3: 'This Transcendant, who bears a striking resemblance to Noan, consistently shows their differences through his distant and cold demeanor.'}
{3: 'He appears to be highly intrigued by the multitude of information you share, yet no matter how you attempt to persuade him, he remains skeptical.'}
{1: '1', 3: '"This Noan" firmly believes that Babylonia is the malevolent force that has erased his "replica\'s" memories and "confined" him in the Clean Zone.'}
{2: '...How is that possible?', 3: '21'}
{3: '—Upon hearing your astonished response, he proceeds to display several videos on his terminal, showcasing Dark Aries being monitored or encircled.'}
{2: 'Noan?', 3: 'Is this fabricated by Lithos?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan?', 3: 'No answer, huh...? I was expecting you to come up with a lie and blame it on Lithos.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Given your confidence, you must have seen more than this, right?', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Dark Aries is indeed in a situation that is hard to explain...', 3: '28', 4: 'The level of surveillance is indeed a bit too much...', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Noan?', 3: "Moreover... if Babylonia were truly as united as you claim, surveillance footage like this wouldn't have found its way to me through Lithos.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '30', 4: '(Kinda hard to argue against that...)', 5: '30'}
{3: 'Ultimately, your attempt to persuade "this Noan" has ended in failure.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "(But it's not completely futile...)", 3: '34'}
{2: "(At least I got evidence to prove the existence of Noan's replica...)", 3: '35', 4: '(At least I gathered some information about Bethe...)', 5: '35'}
{3: 'Besides, a lot of information has been provided to "this Noan."'}
{3: 'He still shares the same nature with Noan. While he may not trust you, he also harbors reservations about placing complete trust in Lithos.'}
{3: 'The more suspicion planted in his mind, the greater the chance he has to recover his memories.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "(But there's no need to waste more time here.)", 3: '40'}
{2: "(He just received a call. Looks like he's about to leave here.)", 3: '41'}
{2: '(I should get ready to escape after he leaves.)', 3: '42'}
{2: '(Everyone will be worried.)', 3: '43', 4: '(Noan will be worried.)', 5: '43'}
{3: 'However... before he leaves the cell, the clockwork firefly that Noan gave you suddenly falls out of your pocket.'}
{3: 'Upon seeing it, "Noan" immediately turns around and walks over, canceling his plan to leave.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory711.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan?', 3: "I'll ask again, how exactly did you get this?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I've already explained.", 3: '53', 4: 'What I told you just now is the truth.', 5: '53'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: "A little lucky charm. To me, it's as important as my name tag. You see the scratch here? It once saved my life.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory711.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: '(Explain it one more time)', 3: '66'}
{3: 'He caresses the bullet mark on the clockwork firefly, lost in thought.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory788.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lithos always tells him that he is the real Noan.'}
{3: 'The one in Babylonia is but a puppet with his memories erased.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg2901_08.jpg'}
{3: 'But how is it possible for such a puppet to have the last memory of that snowy day?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory711.jpg'}
{3: 'Given his understanding of "himself," he would never have given out the firefly as a lucky charm unless he had a lot of trust in the commandant standing before him.'}
{3: "—After all, to most people, it's just a tattered toy. If he were to give a token, it should have been something more appropriate."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "(Now he's just not gonna leave...)", 3: '89', 4: "(Time's running out.)", 5: '89'}
{2: "(He's deep in his thoughts.)", 3: '90', 4: '(This is an opportunity.)', 5: '90'}
{3: 'Seizing the opportunity during "Noan\'s" moment of contemplation, you discreetly slide your hand into your coat, poised to transmit your current coordinates.'}
{3: 'Just as you instinctively reach for the distress interface from memory, his gaze abruptly shifts toward you.'}
{2: 'Noan?', 3: 'What are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before you have a chance to respond, he snatches the terminal from your grasp.'}
{2: 'Noan?', 3: 'The secret channel is still active... Was the communication paused before?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He takes hold of the terminal and proceeds to forcibly "borrow" your face, using it to pass the facial verification.'}
{3: 'Accessing the operation interface of the secret channel, he activates the speaker, instantly transmitting the sound of two people running.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory568.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: '—On the other end of the secret channel.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noan, in pursuit of Bethe, leaps into the underground waterway, and then ascends the winding narrow path to reach the ladder leading to the surface.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory345.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory345.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory568.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory568.jpg'}
{3: 'Drawing upon his honed sense of direction from his time with the Cargo Crew, he realizes that he has circled back to the upper floor of the entrance passage.'}
{3: 'The scent of blood and the stench of decaying corpses grows stronger here. Distinct from the entrance, it is further infused with the odor of vital fluid.'}
{3: 'How many bodies, yearned for by someone, are sealed within these walls, and how many forgotten souls linger amidst their sorrowful cries?'}
{3: 'His body has already surpassed its limits in trying to resist those disruptive devices.'}
{3: 'And the old man, well into his late years, curls up like a pill bug, rolling toward the exit with the assistance of an exoskeleton at an astonishing speed.'}
{3: 'The hastily constructed low tunnel fails to withstand the relentless pursuit, emitting a perilous, rusty sound.'}
{3: '—This place is on the verge of collapse. The already unstable floor is trembling beneath his sprinting steps.'}
{3: 'Just a few more steps, and those who are chasing behind may plummet into the lower level as the collapse ensues.'}
{3: "The young man's voice cuts through the shaking tunnel, stirring echoes that resonate with the lingering resentment of countless departed souls."}
{3: 'The shadowy figure looks back, sneering at the young man, and extends his hand toward the identity verification panel of the last door, just a few meters away.'}
{3: '—At this point, he can no longer make it.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I have to take a gamble here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: "Noan comes to a halt, raising the Rev Blade in his hand in response to the old man's mocking smile."}
{2: 'Noan', 3: '...Those who lost your lives here...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The moment the verification is completed, lightning converges on the blade, and with the resounding roar of the engine, it strikes the fragile walls all around.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory771.jpg'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Please lend me a hand!!'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.7'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '—All things and all spirits come crashing down.'}
